problem.display_name: Graded question - Mapping Reference Numerators - Question 1
problem.markdown:
To be able to edit the WHO Data Quality tool you need to have what authority associated with your user role in DHIS2?
>>Select the one correct answer: (2 attempts) <<
( ) A. Only basic data entry (x) B. Edit indicators ( ) C. Only data visualization ( ) D. User management
[explanation] Feedback: Edit Indicators is correct. [explanation]
